amendment.description: To provide additional funding to ensure an adequate bioterrorism preparedness workforce.

action.text: Amendment SA 1565 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1565 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 47. Record Vote Number: 328.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1565.

Amendment SA 1565 proposed by Senator Clinton to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11103-11105; text: CR S11103) To provide additional funding to ensure an adequate bioterrorism preparedness workforce.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1565 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 47. Record Vote Number: 328.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1565 proposed by Senator Clinton to Amendment SA 1542.
